solution_line_template: Jackie spends a total of {hours_working} + {hours_sleeping} + {hours_exercise} = <<{hours_working}+{hours_sleeping}+{hours_exercise}={total_spent_hours}>>{total_spent_hours} hours on work, exercise, and sleeping.
Therefore he has {hours_in_day} - {total_spent_hours} = <<{hours_in_day}-{total_spent_hours}={free_time}>>{free_time} hours of free time.
